OS-1 Oscilloscope Project

View on GitHub

Intro

I’m making a DSO! I’ve named it the OS-1. Here are the planned specs; some might be “stretch goals”:

  • 100 MHz analog bandwidth
  • 400 MHz alias-free sampling rate
  • Frontend from 500 µV/div to 10 V/div with switchable termination and probe detect
  • Two channels, extensible to four
  • Full math capabilities
  • Serial decode
  • Programmable digital trigger
  • Segmented memory
